summary: Home hero and site header were updated to use a new Falconrock logo path and to show a prominent brand lockup, but the actual new static logo asset file was not added in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a new static Falconrock logo image asset and add it to the frontend static assets directory (frontend/public/assets/generated) using the exact filename falconrock-logo.dim_512x512.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code now referencing /assets/generated/falconrock-logo.dim_512x512.png, but there are no added files, so the required image asset itself is not present in the change summary.
